if_you_cant_decide_random_recipe_explore: If you canâ€™t decide what recipe to cook, use random recipe explorer ;-)
multiple_devices_use_export_as_zip_etc: export as zip for using them on multiple devices, OR as text for people who sadly donâ€™t have the app installed.
for_more_relaxed_shopping_add_to_shoppin: you can add the ingredients of your recipe to your shoppingcart for more relaxed shopping.
name: name
no_recipes_under_this_category: You have no recipes under this category
no_added_favorites_yet: You haven't added any favorites yet
recipename_taken_description: change the recipename to something more detailed or maybe you just forgot, that you already saved this recipe :)
check_ingredients_input_description:
it seems like your ingredients information aren't filled out correctly. They must be filled in like the following: 
- every ingredient must have a name
- every ingredient with a unit must also have an amount
check_ingredient_section_fields_descript: if you have multiple sections, you need to provide a title for each section.
check_filled_in_information_description: it seems, that you havenâ€™t filled in the required fields. Please check for any red marked text fields.
no_recipes_to_search_through: you have no recipes to search through
sure_you_want_to_delete_this_nutrition: Are you sure you want to delete this nutrition:
sure_you_want_to_delete_this_category: Are you sure you want to delete this category:
sure_you_want_to_delete_this_recipe: Are you sure that you want to delete this recipe:
snackbar_automatic_theme_applied: if supported, theme will be applied, when restarting the app :)
you_made_it_to_the_end: you made it to the end
too_many_images_for_the_steps: Add steps description or remove image/s
too_many_images_for_the_steps_descriptio: you have added more images for the steps, than steps with a description. So images would get lost. Please fix the issue.
do_you_want_to_import_the_recipe: do you want to import the recipe's?
ingredient_manager_description: Here you can manage the ingredients, which you get suggested when adding a recipe or searching for them. When you edit or delete them, they don't change for the recipe. It's just for the suggestions for saving time when typing.
nutrition_manager_description: Here you can manage your nutritions. When you edit or delete them, the recipes with nutritions stay the same. If you want to edit the nutrition of an existing recipe, you have to edit the recipe itself.
disclaimer_description: In no event shall the authors of My RecipeBook application be liable for any damages directly or indirectly caused by the application. You are acknowledging that you are 100% responsible for whatever you do with My RecipeBook.
video_to_remove_ads: watch video ad to remove banner ads
video_to_remove_ads_desc: by pressing "watch", you'll see an advertisement video and no more banner ads will be displayed for 30 min. You can stack this.
ingredient_filter_description: purchase pro version in settings to get access to ingredient filter
pull_down_to_refresh: pull down to refresh page and show imported recipes
recipes_not_in_overview: if recipes don't show up in overview, pull down to refresh the page.
no_internet_connection_desc: could not connect to the internet and therefore not load the video.
failed_loading_ad_desc: solutions can be: better internet connection, tap "watch" again or restarting the app
recipes_not_showing_up_desc: if you imported recipes or if for whatever reason recipes don't show up, pull down to refresh the page.
share_recipes_settings_desc:
on this screen, you can:
- select the recipes you want to share to a friend as a single file
- select the recipes you want to save to import on another device or just to make sure, they don't get lost.
tap_here_to_add_recipe: here you can add a new recipe
tap_here_to_manage_categories:
and here you can manage
your recipe categories
pro_version_desc: includes ingredient filter, removal of ads and support of future development
